Get Set Image Tag Property Draw Arc API for C#, ASP.NET Apps
item.description: Aspose.Drawing for .NET 22.1 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 2 File Size: 7.1 MB Posted By: Sergey Vlasov Views: 15 Date Added: 1/28/2022 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/drawing/net/release-notes/2022/aspose-drawing-for-net-22-1-release-notes/DescriptionThe MSI installer for Aspose.Drawing for .NET 22.1 File Details Image.Tag Property Added the Image.Tag property that provides additional data regarding the image. Improved Performance while Saving in PNG Performance has been optimized for PNG rendering and saving.

item.title: Downloads ---New-Releases-aspose.drawing-for-.net-22.1-(dlls-only) .
Configure StartCap & EndCap Pen via API for C#, ASP.NET Apps
item.description: Aspose.Drawing for .NET 22.2 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 4 File Size: 7.1 MB Posted By: Sergey Vlasov Views: 16 Date Added: 2/18/2022 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/drawing/net/release-notes/2022/aspose-drawing-for-net-22-2-release-notes/DescriptionThe MSI installer for Aspose.Drawing for .NET 22.2 File Details Independent StartCap and EndCap in Pen Implemented independent StartCap and EndCap in Pen which enables you to have more flexibility in cap styles at the beginning and end of drawn lines via API.

item.title: Downloads ---New-Releases-aspose.drawing-for-.net-22.2-(dlls-only) .
Handle Generic Typography via API for C#, ASP.NET Apps
item.description: Aspose.Drawing for .NET 22.3 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 4 File Size: 7.1 MB Posted By: Sergey Vlasov Views: 6 Date Added: : 3 weeks ago [3/24/2022] Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/drawing/net/release-notes/2022/aspose-drawing-for-net-22-3-release-notes/DescriptionThe MSI installer for Aspose.Drawing for .NET 22.3 File Details Set Negative Pen.Width Sometimes even Pen Width of 1 is too wide for some laser printers. A quick fix for such scenarios is setting the pen width to negative.

item.title: Downloads ---New-Releases-aspose.drawing-for-.net-22.3-(dlls-only) .
Add Italic & Bold Font Effects via API for C#, ASP.NET Apps
item.description: Aspose.Drawing for .NET 22.4 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 5 File Size: 6.8 MB Date Added: : 4 weeks ago [4/22/2022] Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/drawing/net/release-notes/2022/aspose-drawing-for-net-22-4-release-notes/DescriptionThe MSI installer for Aspose.Drawing for .NET 22.4 File Details Support for Italic & Bold Font Effects Added support for the italic and bold font effects. Support for Transparent GIF Added support for transparency of GIF files.

item.title: Downloads ---New-Releases-aspose.drawing-for-.net-22.4-(dlls-only) .
Downloads ---New Releases-aspose.drawing-for-.net-22.5-(dlls-only)
Font Fallback Support on Linux via API for C#, ASP.NET Apps
item.description: Aspose.Drawing for .NET 22.5 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 5 File Size: 6.78MB Date Added: 10/6/2022 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/drawing/net/release-notes/2022/aspose-drawing-for-net-22-5-release-notes/ File Details Font Fallback Support on Linux Added the font fallback support on Linux. Furthermore, if a font has only italic style, fallback for such font has also been added. Draw Anti-aliased Line Improved the drawing capabilities of the API to draw an anti-aliased line.

item.title: Image Shrinking & Vector Scaling API for C#, ASP.NET Apps
item.description: Aspose.Drawing for .NET 22.6 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 6.79MB Date Added: 4/7/2022 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/drawing/net/release-notes/2022/aspose-drawing-for-net-22-6-release-notes/ File Details Support for Image Shrinking Enhancement in achieving better quality to shrink larger images. Metafiles Vector Scaling Implemented the new feature of vector scaling for metafiles. Edit & Save Multi-frame GIF The API now supports the editing and saving of multi-frame GIF.

item.title: Downloads ---New Releases-aspose.drawing-for-.net-22.6-(dlls-only)
Support to Create Transparent PNG API for C#, ASP.NET Apps
item.description: Aspose.Drawing for .NET 22.7 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 6.77MB Date Added: 14/7/2022 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/drawing/net/release-notes/2022/aspose-drawing-for-net-22-7-release-notes/ File Details Support to Create Transparent PNG Added the support to apply the transparent color to PNG format images via API. Font Fallback for Substrings Added the font fallback option for substrings. Bicubic Filtering Implemented the improvements to the bicubic filtering performance.

item.title: Downloads ---New Releases-aspose.drawing-for-.net-22.7-(dlls-only)
Save GIF image from File or Stream API for C#, ASP.NET Apps
item.description: Aspose.Drawing for .NET 22.8 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 6.77MB Date Added: 22/8/2022 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/drawing/net/release-notes/2022/aspose-drawing-for-net-22-8-release-notes/ File Details Save GIF from File or Stream Ability to save GIF from a file or via a stream. Rotated Text Formatting Ability to format the rotated text. For a complete list of features, enhancements, and bug fixes in this release please visit, Aspose.

item.title: Downloads ---New Releases-aspose.drawing-for-.net-22.8-(dlls-only)
Save 1 BPP (Bits Per Pixel) TIFF & BMP API for C#, .NET Apps
item.description: Aspose.Drawing for .NET 22.9 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 6.81MB Date Added: 27/9/2022 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/drawing/net/release-notes/2022/aspose-drawing-for-net-22-9-release-notes/ File Details Save 1 BPP TIFF & BMP Implemented saving to 1 (one) BPP (Bits Per Pixel) .TIFF and .BMP formats. Load image files from a web stream Added the ability for loading image files from a web stream. For a complete list of features, enhancements, and bug fixes in this release please visit, Aspose.
